respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by Lowell Bowditch
Replaced LYRIC Meter= tag with SPEECH Meter=
Fixed typo in line 2: changed phi to theta in e(wqinou=

$Log: aristoph.thes_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.5 2013-06-13 12:41:19 gcrane tagging now should be compatible with CTS

sp.l: ta\ me\n ga\r a)/ll' au(/th kathgo/rhken eu)=:
a(\ d' e)gw\ pe/ponqa, tau=ta le/cai bou/lomai.
e)moi\ ga\r a(nh\r a)pe/qanen me\n e)n *ku/prw|
te/ws me\n ou)=n a)ll' h(mika/kws e)bosko/mhn:
nu=n d' ou(=tos e)n tai=sin tragw|di/ais poiw=n
tou\s a)/ndras a)nape/peiken ou)k ei)=nai qeou/s:
w(/st' ou)ke/t' e)mpolw=men ou)d' ei)s h(/misu.
nu=n ou)=n a(pa/saisin parainw= kai\ le/gw
tou=ton kola/sai to\n a)/ndra pollw=n ou(/neka:
a)/gria ga\r h(ma=s w)= gunai=kes dra=| kaka/,
a(/t' e)n a)gri/oisi toi=s laxa/nois au)to\s trafei/s.
a)ll' ei)s a)gora\n a)/peimi: dei= ga\r a)ndra/sin

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: dei= de\ tau/ths th=s u(/brews h(mi=n

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: to\ me\n w)= gunai=kes o)cuqumei=sqai sfo/dra
ou) qauma/sio/n e)st', ou)d' e)pizei=n th\n xolh/n.
kau)th\ ga\r e)/gwg', ou(/tws o)nai/mhn tw=n te/knwn,
misw= to\n a)/ndr' e)kei=non, ei) mh\ mai/nomai.
o(/mws d' e)n a)llh/laisi xrh\ dou=nai lo/gon:
au)tai\ ga/r e)smen, kou)demi/' e)/kforos lo/gou.
bare/ws te fe/romen, ei) du/' h(mw=n h)\ tri/a
e)gw\ ga\r au)th\ prw=ton, i(/na ma)/llhn le/gw,
cu/noid' e)mauth=| polla\ dei/n': e)kei=no d' ou)=n
deino/taton, o(/te nu/mfh me\n h)=n trei=s h(me/ras,
o( d' a)nh\r par' e)moi\ kaqhu=den: h)=n de/ moi fi/los,
ou)=tos po/qw| mou 'knuen e)lqw\n th\n qu/ran:
ka)=|t' eu)fu\s e)/gnwn: ei)=ta katabai/nw la/qra|.
o( d' a)nh\r e)rwta=| poi= su\ katabai/neis; ‘o(/poi;
stro/fos m' e)/xei th\n gaste/r w)=ner kw)du/nh:
e)s to\n koprw=n' ou)=n e)/rxomai.’ ba/dize/ nun:
ka)=|q' o( me\n e)/tribe kedri/das a)/nnhqon sfa/kon:
e)gw\ de\ kataxe/asa tou= strofe/ws u(/dwr
e)ch=lqon w(s to\n moixo/n: ei)=t' h)reido/mhn
para\ to\n *)aguia= ku/bd' e)xome/nh th=s da/fnhs.
ou)d' w(s u(po\ tw=n dou/lwn te kw)rewko/mwn
spodou/meq', h)\n mh\ 'xwmen e(/teron, ou) le/gei:
ou)d' w(s o(/tan ma/lisq' u(po/ tou lhkw/meqa
i(/n' o)sfro/menos a(nh\r a)po\ tei/xous ei)siw\n
mhde\n kako\n dra=n u(potoph=tai. tau=q', o(ra=|s,
h(mi=n ti/ tou=t' e)/st'; ou)d' e)kei=n' ei)/rhke/ pw,
w(s h( gunh\ deiknu=sa ta)ndri\ tou)/gkuklon
to\n moixo\n e)ce/pemyen, ou)k ei)/rhke/ pw.
e(te/ran d' e)gw)=|d' h(\ 'fasken w)di/nein gunh\
o( d' a)nh\r perie/trex' w)kuto/ki' w)nou/menos:
to\ d' ei)se/fere grau=s e)n xu/tra| to\ paidi/on,
i(/na mh\ bo/ h, khri/w| bebusme/non:
ei)=q' w(s e)/neusen h( fe/rous', eu)qu\s boa=|,
‘a)/pelq' a)/pelq', h)/dh ga\r w)=ne/r moi dokw=
te/cein.’ to\ ga\r h)=tron th=s xu/tras e)la/ktisen:
xw) me\n geghqw\s e)/trexen, h( d' e)ce/spasen
e)k tou= sto/matos tou= paidi/ou, to\ d' a)ne/kragen.
ei)=q' h( miara\ grau=s, h(\ 'feren to\ paidi/on,
qei= meidiw=sa pro\s to\n a)/ndra kai\ le/gei,
‘le/wn le/wn soi ge/gonen, au)/t' e)/kmagma so/n,
ta/ t' a)/ll' a(paca/panta kai\ to\ po/sqion
tw=| sw=| proso/moion, streblo\n w(/sper ku/ttaron.’
tau=t' ou) poiou=men ta\ kaka/; nh\ th\n *)/artemin

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' ou) ga/r e)sti tw=n a)naisxu/twn fu/sei gunaikw=n
ou)de\n ka/kion ei)s a)/panta plh\n a)/r' ei) gunai=kes.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: ou)/ toi ma\ th\n *)/aglauron w)= gunai=kes eu)= fronei=te,
a)ll' h)\ pefa/rmaxq' h)\ kako/n ti me/ga pepo/nqat' a)/llo,
tau/thn e)w=sai th\n fqo/ron toiau=ta periubri/zein
h(ma=s a(pa/sas. ei) me\n oi)=n tis e)/stin: ei) de\ mh/, h(mei=s
au)tai/ te kai\ ta\ doula/ria te/fran poqe\n labou=sai
tau/ths a)poyilw/somen to\n xoi=ron, i(/na didaxqh=|
gunh\ gunai=kas ou)=sa mh\ kakw=s le/gein to\ loipo/n.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: mh\ dh=ta to/n ge xoi=ron w)= gunai=kes. ei) ga\r ou)/shs
parrhsi/as ka)co\n le/gein o(/sai pa/resmen a)stai/,
dia\ tou=to tillome/nhn me dei= dou=nai di/khn u(f' u(mw=n;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: ou) ga/r se dei= dou=nai di/khn; h(/tis mo/nh te/tlhkas
u(pe\r a)ndro\s a)nteipei=n, o(\s h(ma=s polla\ kaka\ de/draken
e)pi/thdes eu(ri/skwn lo/gous, o(/pou gunh\ ponhra\
ou)pw/pot' e)poi/hs', o(/ti gunh\ sw/frwn e)/docen ei)=nai.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: e)gw\ ga\r oi)=da tai)/tion. *mi/an ga\r ou)k a)\n ei)/pois

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: a)kou/et' w)= gunai=kes oi(=' ei)/rhken h( panou=rgos

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: ei)/rhx' o(/sa cu/noid': e)pei\ bou/lesqe plei/on' ei)/pw;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: a)ll' ou)k a)\n e)/t' e)/xois: o(/sa ga\r h)/|dhsq' e)ce/xeas a(/panta.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: ma\ *di/' ou)de/pw th\n muriosth\n moi=ran w(=n poiou=men.
e)pei\ ta/d' ou)k ei)/rhx', o(ra=|s, w(s stleggi/das labou=sai

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: w(/s t' au)= ta\ kre/' e)c *)apatouri/wn tai=s mastropoi=s didou=sai

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: ou)d' w(s to\n a)/ndra tw=| pele/kei gunh\ katespo/dhsen,
ou)k ei)=pon: ou)d' w(s farma/kois e(te/ra to\n a)/ndr' e)/mhnen,
ou)d' w(s u(po\ th=| pue/lw| katw/ruce/n pot'—

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: ou)d' w(s su\ th=s dou/lhs tekou/shs a)/rren ei)=ta sauth=|
tou=q' u(peba/lou, to\ so\n de\ quga/trion parh=kas au)th=|.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: ou)/ toi ma\ tw\ qew\ su\ kataproi/cei le/gousa tauti/,

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: ou) dh\ ma\ *di/a su/ g' a(/yei.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: pro/sqes mo/non, ka)gw/ se nh\ th\n *)/artemin—

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: to\n shsamou=nq' o(\n kate/fages, tou=ton xesei=n poih/sw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pau/sasqe loidorou/menai: kai\ ga\r gunh/ tis h(mi=n
e)spoudakui=a prostre/xei. pri\n ou)=n o(mou= gene/sqai,
siga=q', i(/n' au)th=s kosmi/ws puqw/meq' a(/tta le/cei.

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: o(/ti me\n fi/los ei)/m' u(mi=n, e)pi/dhlos tai=s gna/qois:
gunaikomanw= ga\r procenw= q' u(mw=n a)ei/.
kai\ nu=n a)kou/sas pra=gma peri\ u(mw=n me/ga
o)li/gw| ti pro/teron kat' a)gora\n lalou/menon,
h(/kw fra/swn tou=t' a)ggelw=n q' u(mi=n, i(/na
skoph=te kai\ thrh=te mh\ kai\ prospe/sh|
u(mi=n a)fa/rktois pra=gma deino\n kai\ me/ga.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ d' e)/stin w)= pai=; pai=da ga/r s' ei)ko\s kalei=n,
e(/ws a)\n ou(/tws ta\s gna/qous yila\s e)/xh|s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: pro\s poi=on e)/rgon h)\ ti/nos gnw/mhs xa/rin;

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: i(/n' a(/tta bouleu/oisqe kai\ me/lloite dra=n,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: kai\ pw=s le/lhqen e)n gunaici\n w)\n a)nh/r;

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: kai\ ta)/ll' a(/panq' w(/sper gunai=k' e)skeu/asen.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: pei/qesqe tou/tw| tau=ta; ti/s d' ou(/tws a)nh\r

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: lhrei=s: e)gw\ ga\r ou)k a)\n h)=lqon a)ggelw=n,
ei) mh\ 'pepu/smhn tau=ta tw=n sa/f' ei)do/twn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' w)= gunai=kes ou)k e)linu/ein e)xrh=n,
a)lla\ skopei=n to\n a)/ndra kai\ zhtei=n o(/pou
kai\ su\ cune/ceur' au)to/n, w(s a)\n th\n xa/rin
tau/thn te ka)kei/nhn e)/xh|s w)= pro/cene.

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: fe/r' i)/dw: ti/s h( prw/th su/;

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: gignw/skeq' u(mei=s h(/tis e)/sq' h(/d' h( gunh/;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: gignw/skomen dh=t'. a)lla\ ta\s a)/llas a)/qrei.

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: h(di\ de\ dh\ ti/s e)stin h( to\ paidi/on

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: au(/th su\ poi= stre/fei; me/n' au)tou=. ti/ to\ kako/n;

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: su\ d' ou)=n poi/ei tou=t'. a)namenw= ga\r e)nqa/de.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)na/mene dh=ta kai\ sko/pei g' au)th\n sfo/dra:
mo/nhn ga\r au)th\n w)=ner ou) gignw/skomen.

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: ti/ kardami/zeis; ou) badiei= deu=r' w(s e)me/;

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: e)/sq' o( dei=n', o(\s kai/ pote

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: a)/pelq'. e)gw\ ga\r basaniw= tau/thn kalw=s
e)k tw=n i(erw=n tw=n pe/rusi: su\ d' a)po/sthqi/ moi,
i(/na mh\ 'pakou/sh|s w)\n a)nh/r. su\ d' ei)pe/ moi
o(/ ti prw=ton h(mi=n tw=n i(erw=n e)dei/knuto.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: fe/r' i)/dw, ti/ me/ntoi prw=ton h)=n; e)pi/nomen.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: tauti\ me\n h)/kousa/s tinos: ti/ dai\ tri/ton;

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: ska/fion *ce/null' h)/|thsen: ou) ga\r h)=n a)mi/s.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: ou)de\n le/geis. deu=r' e)lqe\ deu=r' w)= *klei/sqenes:

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: a)po/duson au)to/n: ou)de\n u(gie\s ga\r le/gei.

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: xa/la taxe/ws to\ stro/fion w)=nai/sxunte su/.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: w(s kai\ stibara/ tis fai/netai kai\ kartera/:
kai\ nh\ *di/a titqou/s g' w(/sper h(mei=s ou)k e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: steri/fh ga/r ei)mi kou)k e)ku/hsa pw/pote.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: nu=n: to/te de\ mh/thr h)=sqa pai/dwn e)nne/a.

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: a)ni/stas' o)rqo/s. poi= to\ pe/os w)qei=s ka/tw;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: todi\ die/kuye kai\ ma/l' eu)/xrwn w)= ta/lan.

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: i)sqmo/n tin' e)/xeis w)=nqrwp': a)/nw te kai\ ka/tw

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: w)= miaro\s ou(=tos: tau=t' a)/r' u(pe\r *eu)ripi/dou

sp.speaker: *kleisqe/nhs
sp.l: e)gw\ de\ tau=ta toi=s pruta/nesin a)ggelw=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h(ma=s toi/nun meta\ tou=t' h)/dh ta\s lampa/das a(yame/nas xrh\
cuzwsame/nas eu)= ka)ndrei/ws tw=n q' i(mati/wn a)podu/sas
zhtei=n, ei)/ pou ka)/llos tis a)nh\r a)nelh/luqe, kai\ periqre/cai
th\n pu/kna pa=san kai\ ta\s skhna\s kai\ ta\s dio/dous diaqrh=sai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei)=a dh\ prw/tista me\n xrh\ kou=fon e)corma=n po/da
kai\ diaskopei=n siwph=| pantaxh=|: mo/non de\ xrh\
mh\ bradu/nein, w(s o( kairo/s e)sti mh\ me/llein e)/ti,
a)lla\ th\n prw/thn tre/xein xrh=n w(s ta/xist' h)/dh ku/klw|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ei)=a/ nun i)/xneue kai\ ma/teue taxu\ pa/nt',
kai\ ta\ th=|de kai\ ta\ deu=ro

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h)\n ga/r me la/qh| dra/sas a)no/sia,
dw/sei te di/khn kai\ pro\s tou/tw|
fh/sei d' ei)=nai/ te qeou\s fanerw=s,
mhdome/nous poiei=n o(/ ti kalw=s e)/xei.
ka)\n mh\ poiw=si tau=ta toia/d' e)/stai:
au)tw=n o(/tan lhfqh=| tis a)no/sio/n ti drw=n,
pa=sin e)mfanh\s o(ra=n e)/stai gunaici\ kai\ brotoi=sin,
o(/ti ta/ te para/noma ta/ t' a)no/sia parw\n
a)ll' e)/oix' h(mi=n a(/panta/ tws dieske/fqai kalw=s.
ou)x o(rw=men gou=n e)/t' a)/llon ou)de/n' e)gkaqh/menon.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: a)= poi= su\ feu/geis; ou(=tos ou(=tos ou) menei=s;
ta/lain' e)gw\ ta/laina, kai\ to\ paidi/on
e)carpa/sas moi frou=dos a)po\ tou= titqi/ou.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: ke/kraxqi: tou=to d' ou)de/pote su\ ywmiei=s,
h)\n mh/ m' a)fh=t': a)ll' e)nqa/d' e)pi\ tw=n mhri/wn

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: gunai=kes, ou)k a)rh/cet'; ou) pollh\n boh\n
sth/sesqe kai\ tropai=on, a)lla\ tou= mo/nou

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: w(s a(/pant' a)/r' e)sti\ to/lmhs mesta\ ka)naisxunti/as.
oi(=on au)= de/draken e)/rgon, oi(=on au)= fi/lai to/de.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: oi(=on u(mw=n e)cara/cw th\n a)/gan au)qadi/an.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: tau=ta dh=t' ou) deina\ pra/gmat' e)sti\ kai\ peraite/rw;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: deina\ dh=q', o(/stis g' e)/xei mou 'carpa/sas to\ paidi/on.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/ a)\n ou)=n ei)/poi pro\s tau=ta/ tis, o(/te

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' ou)=n h(/keis g' o(/qen ou) fau/lws g'

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: tou=to me/ntoi mh\ ge/noito mhdamw=s, a)peu/xomai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: ti/s ou)=n soi, ti/s a)\n su/mmaxos e)k qew=n

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: ma/thn lalei=te: th\n d' e)gw\ ou)k a)fh/sw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: a)ll' ou) ma\ tw\ qew\ ta/x' ou) xai/rwn i)/sws
kai\ ga\r a)ntameiyo/mesqa/ s' w(/sper ei)ko\s a)nti\ tw=nde.
ta/xa de\ metabalou=s' e)pi\ kako\n e(tero/tropon
a)lla\ ta/sde me\n labei=n xrh=n s' e)kfe/rein te tw=n cu/lwn,
kai\ katai/qein to\n panou=rgon purpolei=n q' o(/son ta/xos.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: u(/fapte kai\ ka/taiqe: su\ de\ to\ *krhtiko\n
a)po/duqi taxe/ws: tou= qana/tou d' w)= paidi/on
touti\ ti/ e)/stin; a)sko\s e)ge/neq' h( ko/rh
w)= me/ga kaph/lois a)gaqo\n h(mi=n d' au)= kako/n,
kako\n de\ kai\ toi=s skeuari/ois kai\ th=| kro/kh|.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: para/balle dh=ta: su\ d' a)po/krinai/ moi todi/,

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: po/s' e)/th de\ ge/gone; trei=s *xoa=s h)\ te/ttaras;

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: mh\ dh=q', i(keteu/w s': a)ll' e)/m' o(/ ti xrh/|zeis poi/ei

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: i(/n' ou)=n to/ g' ai(=ma tou= te/knou tou)mou= la/bw.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: u(/pex' au)to/, xariou=mai ga\r e(/n ge tou=to/ soi.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: kakw=s a)po/loi', w(s fqonero\s ei)= kai\ dusmenh/s.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: touti\ to\ de/rma th=s i(erei/as gi/gnetai.

sp.speaker: *gunh\ *a
sp.l: o( panou=rgos ou(=tos. a)ll' e)peidh/per pa/rei,
toi=sin pruta/nesin a(\ pepoi/hx' ou(=tos fra/sw.

sp.speaker: *mnhsi/loxos
sp.l: a)/ge dh\ ti/s e)/stai mhxanh\ swthri/as;
ti/s pei=ra, ti/s e)pi/noi'; o( me\n ga\r ai)/tios
ou) fai/netai/ pw. fe/re ti/n' ou)=n a)\n a)/ggelon
pe/myaim' e)p' au)to/n; oi)=d' e)gw\ kai\ dh\ po/ron
e)k tou= *palamh/dous: w(s e)kei=nos, ta\s pla/tas
r(i/yw gra/fwn. a)ll' ou) pa/reisin ai( pla/tai.
po/qen ou)=n ge/noint' a)/n moi pla/tai po/qen; po/qen;
ti/ d' a)\n ei) tadi\ ta)ga/lmat' a)nti\ tw=n platw=n
cu/lon ge/ toi kai\ tau=ta ka)kei=n' h)=n cu/lon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h(mei=s toi/nun h(ma=s au)ta\s eu)= le/cwmen paraba=sai,
kai/toi pa=s tis to\ gunaikei=on fu=lon kaka\ po/ll' a)goreu/ei,
w(s pa=n e)sme\n kako\n a)nqrw/pois ka)c h(mw=n e)stin a(/panta,
e)/rides nei/kh sta/sis a)rgale/a lu/ph po/lemos. fe/re dh/ nun,
ei) kako/n e)smen, ti/ gamei=q' h(ma=s, ei)/per a)lhqw=s kako/n e)smen,
ka)pagoreu/ete mh/t' e)celqei=n mh/t' e)kku/yasan a(lw=nai,
a)ll' ou(twsi\ pollh=| spoudh=| to\ kako\n bou/lesqe fula/ttein;
ka)\n e)ce/lqh| to\ gu/naio/n poi, ka)=|q' eu(/rht' au)to\ qu/rasin,
mani/as mai/nesq', ou(\s xrh=n spe/ndein kai\ xai/rein, ei)/per a)lhqw=s
e)/ndoqen hu(/rete frou=don to\ kako\n kai\ mh\ katelamba/net' e)/ndon.
ka)\n katada/rqwmen e)n a)llotri/wn pai/zousai kai\ kopiw=sai,
pa=s tis to\ kako\n tou=to zhtei= peri\ ta\s kli/nas perinostw=n.
ka)\n e)k quri/dos paraku/ptwmen, to\ kako\n zhtei=te qea=sqai:
ka)\n ai)sxunqei=s' a)naxwrh/sh|, polu\ ma=llon pa=s e)piqumei=
au)=qis to\ kako\n paraku/yan i)dei=n. ou(/tws h(mei=s e)pidh/lws
u(mw=n e)smen polu\ belti/ous, ba/sano/s te pa/restin i)de/sqai.
ba/sanon dw=men po/teroi xei/rous. h(mei=s me\n ga/r famen u(ma=s,
u(mei=s d' h(ma=s. skeyw/meqa dh\ ka)ntitiqw=men pro\s e(/kaston,
paraba/llousai th=s te gunaiko\s kai\ ta)ndro\s tou)/nom' e(ka/stou.
*nausima/xhs me/n g' h(/ttwn e)sti\n *xarmi=nos: dh=la de\ ta)/rga.
kai\ me\n dh\ kai\ *kleofw=n xei/rwn pa/ntws dh/pou *calabakxou=s.
pro\s *)aristoma/xhn de\ xro/nou pollou=, pro\s e)kei/nhn th\n *maraqw=ni,
kai\ *ctratoni/khn u(mw=n ou)dei\s ou)d' e)gxeirei= polemi/zein.
a)ll' *eu)bou/lhs tw=n pe/rusi/n tis bouleuth/s e)stin a)mei/nwn
paradou\s e(te/rw| th\n boulei/an; ou)d' au)to\s tou=to/ ge fh/seis.
ou(/tws h(mei=s polu\ belti/ous tw=n a)ndrw=n eu)xo/meq' ei)=nai.
ou)d' a)\n kle/yasa gunh\ zeu/gei kata\ penth/konta ta/lanta
e)s po/lin e)/lqoi tw=n dhmosi/wn: a)ll' h)\n ta\ me/gisq' u(fe/lhtai
formo\n purw=n ta)ndro\s kle/yas', au)qhmero\n au)/t' a)pe/dwken.
